properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.authorization-endpoint
properties.description: OAuth2认证接口URI

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.auto-config-login-page
properties.description:
是否自定配置登录页面路由（loginPageUrl -> loginPageView）
注：如配置为false，则需要手动编程映射登录页，如通过Controller实现，且登录页面采用form表单形式，form.action需要与loginProcessingUrl配置一致

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.consent-page-url
properties.description: OAuth2 Consent确认授权页面URL（对应GET请求）

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.enable-oidc-slo
properties.description: 是否开启OIDC单点登出（即开启OP端end_session_endpoint及RP端frontchannel/backchannel_logout_uri）

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.end-session-endpoint
properties.description: OIDC 认证服务统一登出end_session_endpoint对应的URI

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.issuer
properties.description: OAuth2 issuer - 发布者（对应认证服务器URI）

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.jwk-set-endpoint
properties.description: OAuth2 Json Web Key公钥获取接口URI

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.login-page-url
properties.description: 认证服务登录页面URL（对应GET请求）

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.login-page-view
properties.description: 认证服务登录页面View

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.login-processing-url
properties.description: 登录表单action（对应POST请求）

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.logout-page-url
properties.description: 认证服务登出确认页面URL（对应GET请求）

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.logout-page-view
properties.description: 认证服务登出确认页面View

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.logout-redirect-default-url
properties.description: 认证服务登出后默认跳转页面URL

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.logout-redirect-default-view
properties.description: 认证服务登出后默认跳转页面View

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.oidc-user-info-endpoint
properties.description: OIDC 获取用户信息接口URI

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.password-encoder
properties.description: 认证服务用户密码编码器（支持bcrypt, pbkdf2, scrypt, argon2）

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.rsa-private-key
properties.description: 认证服务JWT加密RSA公钥

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.rsa-public-key
properties.description: 认证服务JWT解密RSA公钥

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.static-resource-white-list
properties.description: 静态资源 - 白名单（无需认证可直接访问）

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.token-endpoint
properties.description: OAuth2 令牌接口URI

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.token-introspection-endpoint
properties.description: OAuth2 检查令牌接口URI

properties.name: spring.security.oauth2.authserver.token-revocation-endpoint
properties.description: OAuth2 吊销令牌接口URI
